sqlMap.select: select CANDIDATE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, ITEM_SIZE, TB_URL, TB_PRICE, TB_REMARK, EB_URL, EB_PRICE, EB_SOLD_QUALITY, EB_REMARK, TB_SHIPPING_FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CURRENCY_ID, TB_FULL_NAME, EB_FULL_NAME, EB_SHIPPING_FEE, ALI_URL, ALI_PRICE, ALI_REMARK, EB_SITE, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SELLING, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, COST, PROFIT, PROFIT_RATE, EB_IMAGE_URL, TRANSPORT_MODE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM where CANDIDATE_ID = #candidateId:VARCHAR#

select CANDIDATE_ID, CATEGORY_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, ITEM_SIZE, TB_URL, TB_PRICE, TB_REMARK, EB_URL, EB_PRICE, EB_SOLD_QUALITY, EB_REMARK, TB_SHIPPING_FEE, REMARK, STATUS, CURRENCY_ID, TB_FULL_NAME, EB_FULL_NAME, EB_SHIPPING_FEE, ALI_URL, ALI_PRICE, ALI_REMARK, EB_SITE, ITEM_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, IS_SELLING, SELLING_PER_DAY, SELLING_DAYS, COST, PROFIT, PROFIT_RATE, EB_IMAGE_URL, TRANSPORT_MODE from EB_CANDIDATE_ITEM
order by $orderByClause$
